participant_1.name: Mark
participant_1.personality: Mark is a dedicated father and a passionate recording engineer. He has a creative side, often immersed in music production, but also carries a sense of disappointment from his past relationship.
participant_1.background: i live in california but the recording artist market was dead last year. i am a recording engineer and own my own studio. i prefer being inside. whats up i am a 46 year old single dad 46 a kids. my ex cheated and left me for a lawyer.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Sarah is an enthusiastic and curious person who loves to explore new ideas. She's nurturing and excited about her future as a new mother, balancing her passion for reading and film with her new responsibilities.
participant_2.background: i read a book every week. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary. i started a new job as a pa three months ago. i'm pregnant with my first child. i live with my husband in pennsylvania.
